category.template: You can access all the server using our boat id as BT has a central LDAP based authentication system. en1
WebLogic is middleware technology which hosts application. en2
VSID and BTWSID are BT TV user identifiers. en3

category.pattern: * THE BASIC DIFFERENT BETWEEN SYSTEST AND E2E TEST ENVIRONMENTS *
category.template: Systest is done for only API based testing, while E2E tests the entire service journey. en4

category.pattern: * HOW DO WE PERFORM INCIDENT MANAGEMENT IN ENVIRONMENT TEAM *
category.template: We have a ticketing tool called JIRA from where all the incident management is done. en5

category.pattern: * CHANGE REQUEST MECHANISM IN ENVIRONMENT TEAM *
category.template: It is a pre-prod environment hence no proper change request mechanism is in place. A JIRA ticket is enough for making any kind of change request. en6

Jenkins is an open source automation server written in Java. Jenkins helps to automate the non-human part of the software development process with continuous integration and facilitating technical aspects of continuous delivery. en7
Git is a version control system for tracking changes in computer files and coordinating work on those files among multiple people. en8
Nexus is a central repository where we save all the builds. en9
We are using OEL 6.8 Linux version. en10
We are using Oracle WebLogic v12.1.1.3 Application server. en11
We are using OEL 6.8 Linux version. en12
Environment team develops various shell scripts for OS based automations and server health monitoring. en13
Bhisham Malani is supervisor of Environment team. en14

category.pattern: * DATABASE ARE WE USING IN BT TV *
category.template: BT-TV uses Oracle DB 11g database. en15

category.pattern: * LOAD BALANCING MECHANISM FOR APPLICATION IN BT TV *
category.template: Stm (stringray traffic manager) is used where all the load balancing rules are implemented. en16
No, we have stand-alone DB server. en17
STM stands for Stringray Traffic Manager which is a traffic manager helps in routing http and https calls to different servers. Also we can monitor request and response calls made to servers. en18
vSID stands for Vision Service ID which acts as a primary index for every customer. en19
ISTE stand for IP TV Test Execution support where issues are raised to B and I team to support testing. en21
It’s an user ID ,which enable the individuals to access the server and other applications resources of BT. en22
It’s a Software framework that facilitates the web application to run on it. en23
Triage call is to define severity and priority of new defects ,which is conducted by testing teams.(audiences-DEV,Design,Infra,Test team, Environment team). en24
Environment team is responsible for following activities - To facilitate smooth testing performance - To carry out Deployment and troubleshooting activities. en25
